Coinagehall Street Helston on Flora Day

is in Cornwall on the Lizard Peninsular.

value: By train: Nearest National Rail station is
on the main Penzance - Plymouth - London Paddington line, with buses connecting with trains operated by Truronian.  Also bus services by First Bus Cornwall.
By coach: National Express coaches serve Helston on the way from London Victoria to Penzance.
By car: both council operated car parks and on-street parking.
